item.description:
Since the Red Sox will not be playing in todays World Series game, a couple of us will be watching the movie 50/50 at the Woburn Cinema. 

Purchase your ticket and meet inside at the entrance to the 50/50 Theatre at 11:25pm.

Start time is 11:30pm. Run time is approximately 2 hours or much shorter than your average Sox game. 

The movie 50/50 is not about the Red Sox 50/50 Raffle although it's ending is somewhat similar to the end of Game 162 and the Sox season.

50/50 is a comedy/drama about Adam having cancer, his girlfriend Rachael, and his best friend and co-worker Kyle's disliking her. Please read a review and attend if you choose.  

Lunch at ScoreBoard next door, a beer and some football watching is an option after the movie.
item.how_to_find_us: Movie starts at 12:05pm, Meet at 12:00pm at the Entrance to the 50/50 Theatre
item.name: Watch The Movie 50/50 at Woburn Showcase Cinema & Optional Lunch at Scoreboard
